ViewObject.Name: PromoProdukView
ViewObject.SelectList: PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CLASS, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_BRAND, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_EXT, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_PACK, PromoProduk.DESCR, PromoProduk.MEKANISME, PromoProduk.AMOUNT_PROMO, PromoProduk.EST_BUDGET_PROP, PromoProduk.REG_CUST_FLAG, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PVAR.SET_VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM (SELECT PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.SET_VARIANT_DESC FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV, APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY IMC WHERE IMC.SET_VARIANT = PV.PROD_VARIANT GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.SET_VARIANT_DESC) PVAR WHERE PVAR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PVAR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_VARIANT, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PITEM.ITEM_DESCRIPTION) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM (SELECT PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.ITEM_DESCRIPTION FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI, APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY IMC WHERE IMC.ITEM = PI.PROD_ITEM GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.ITEM_DESCRIPTION) PITEM WHERE PITEM.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PITEM.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_ITEM, (SELECT SUM(NVL(DIS.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0)) AS NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS DISC_NON_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM(NVL(DIS.DISC_YEARLY,0)) AS YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS DISC_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM((((NVL(DIS.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS DISC_RASIO_NON_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM((((NVL(DIS.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS DISC_RASIO_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM(((NVL(DIS.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0) + NVL(DIS.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1)*100)) AS RASIO_TOTAL FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS DISC_RASIO_TOTAL, (SELECT SUM(NVL(BON.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0) * NVL(BON.QTY_FROM,0)) AS NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BARANG_BONUS_NON_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM(NVL(BON.DISC_YEARLY,0) * NVL(BON.QTY_FROM,0)) AS YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BARANG_BONUS_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM((((NVL(BON.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BARANG_BONUS_RASIO_NON_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM((((NVL(BON.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BARANG_BONUS_RASIO_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM(((NVL(BON.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0) + NVL(BON.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1)*100)) AS RASIO_TOTAL FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BARANG_BONUS_RASIO_TOTAL, (SELECT SUM(NVL(BIA.BIAYA_NON_YEARLY,0)) AS NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_NON_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM(NVL(BIA.BIAYA_YEARLY,0)) AS YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM((((NVL(BIA.BIAYA_NON_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_RASIO_NON_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM((((NVL(BIA.BIAYA_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_RASIO_YEARLY, (SELECT SUM(((NVL(BIA.BIAYA_NON_YEARLY,0) + NVL(BIA.BIAYA_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1)*100)) AS RASIO_TOTAL FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_RASIO_TOTAL, PromoProduk.BUDGET_BY, PromoProduk.KODE_POSTING, PromoProduk.VALID_COMB, PromoProduk.ITEM_EXPENSE, PromoProduk.KODE_POSTING_MF, PromoProduk.EXCL_CUST_BY, (SELECT CASE WHEN PR.USER_TYPE_CREATOR = 'HO' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || PD.REG_CUST_FLAG WHEN PR.USER_TYPE_CREATOR = 'AREA' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || PR.CUST_REG_FLAG ELSE '' END FROM PROPOSAL PR, PROMO_PRODUK PD WHERE PD.PROPOSAL_ID = PR.PROPOSAL_ID AND PD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS EXCL_CUST_LOV_PARAM, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.PROD_VARIANT) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_VAR_CODE, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.PROD_ITEM) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE, PromoProduk.DISC_MF, PromoProduk.DISC_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.DISC_RASIO_MF, PromoProduk.DISC_RASIO_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.DISC_RASIO_TOTAL AS DISC_RASIO_TOTAL1, (SELECT UCP.USER_CUSTOMER FROM FCS_USER_CUST_PRIV UCP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE UCP.USER_NAME = PROP.CREATED_BY AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID) AS USER_CUSTOMER, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_MF, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_RASIO_MF, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_RASIO_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_RASIO_TOTAL, PromoProduk.BIA_MF, PromoProduk.BIA_ONTOP, PromoProduk.BIA_RASIO_MF, PromoProduk.BIA_RASIO_TOTAL, PromoProduk.BIA_RASION_ONTOP

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductVariant
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PVAR.SET_VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM (SELECT PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.SET_VARIANT_DESC FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV, APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY IMC WHERE IMC.SET_VARIANT = PV.PROD_VARIANT GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.SET_VARIANT_DESC) PVAR WHERE PVAR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PVAR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductItem
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PITEM.ITEM_DESCRIPTION) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM (SELECT PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.ITEM_DESCRIPTION FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI, APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY IMC WHERE IMC.ITEM = PI.PROD_ITEM GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, IMC.ITEM_DESCRIPTION) PITEM WHERE PITEM.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PITEM.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DiscNonYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(NVL(DIS.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0)) AS NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DiscYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(NVL(DIS.DISC_YEARLY,0)) AS YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DiscRasioNonYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM((((NVL(DIS.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DiscRasioYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM((((NVL(DIS.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DiscRasioTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(((NVL(DIS.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0) + NVL(DIS.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1)*100)) AS RASIO_TOTAL FROM TARGET TR, DISCOUNT DIS WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = DIS.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BarangBonusNonYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(NVL(BON.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0) * NVL(BON.QTY_FROM,0)) AS NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BarangBonusYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(NVL(BON.DISC_YEARLY,0) * NVL(BON.QTY_FROM,0)) AS YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BarangBonusRasioNonYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM((((NVL(BON.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BarangBonusRasioYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM((((NVL(BON.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BarangBonusRasioTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(((NVL(BON.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0) + NVL(BON.DISC_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1)*100)) AS RASIO_TOTAL FROM TARGET TR, PROMO_BONUS BON WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BON.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaNonYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(NVL(BIA.BIAYA_NON_YEARLY,0)) AS NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(NVL(BIA.BIAYA_YEARLY,0)) AS YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaRasioNonYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM((((NVL(BIA.BIAYA_NON_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_NON_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaRasioYearly
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM((((NVL(BIA.BIAYA_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1))*100)) AS RASIO_YEARLY FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaRasioTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SUM(((NVL(BIA.BIAYA_NON_YEARLY,0) + NVL(BIA.BIAYA_YEARLY,0))/NVL(TR.VALUE,1)*100)) AS RASIO_TOTAL FROM TARGET TR, BIAYA BIA WHERE TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND TR.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ExclCustLovParam
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT CASE WHEN PR.USER_TYPE_CREATOR = 'HO' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || PD.REG_CUST_FLAG WHEN PR.USER_TYPE_CREATOR = 'AREA' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || PR.CUST_REG_FLAG ELSE '' END FROM PROPOSAL PR, PROMO_PRODUK PD WHERE PD.PROPOSAL_ID = PR.PROPOSAL_ID AND PD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductVarCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.PROD_VARIANT) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductItemCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.PROD_ITEM) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: UserCustomer
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT UCP.USER_CUSTOMER FROM FCS_USER_CUST_PRIV UCP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE UCP.USER_NAME = PROP.CREATED_BY AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID
